Key Match Events: Francisco Lindor broke up Bowden Francis’ no-hit bid with a leadoff home run in the 9th inning
Francisco Alvarez hit a three-run home run
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Mets honored first responders with special caps
Lindor used a custom-decorated glove on the anniversary of 9/11
Others: Sean Manaea struck out eight in 6 2/3 innings, allowing one run and three hits
Danny Young (4-0) got one out in relief to help the Mets win for the 11th time in 13 games
Chad Green (4-6) replaced Francis and gave up an infield single to Jose Iglesias, who advanced to second on a throwing error
Pinch-hitter Addison Barger had an RBI single off Ryne Stanek with two outs in the bottom of the 9th
George Springer followed with an infield single, but Edwin Díaz needed only one pitch to earn his 18th save in 24 chances
